column1: al-ṣan‘ah. istihlāl. tawshīḥ mashṭūr al-raml li-ibn zumarik

column2: yā lahā min sā‘atin nilt bihā
tahjurunī yā hājirī min ghayr zallah
column3: faqult lā ḥawl walā qūwah ilā bi-al-lah

column2: tahjurunī yā hājirī min ghayr zallah
column3: faqult lā ḥawl walā qūwah ilā bi-al-lah

column1: al-ṣan‘ah. shoghl. ‘irāq al-‘urb. tawshīḥ muqtaḍab lābin rāfi‘ rāsah

column2: anā sami‘t al-nās qālūā fī al-mathal
